programme.desc: The daily sports talk show delivers a compelling, incisive and passionate filter to the top sports stories of the day as the host engages in lively discussions, debates and disagreements over the day's news, and no topic is off limits.

programme.title: TMZ Sports
programme.desc: Covering gossip, scandal and the everyday lives of athletes in college and professional sports, the crew comically highlights exclusive footage of the superstars spotted around Hollywood, New York City and other parts of the country.

programme.desc: Media personalities offer their views and opinions on the day's most intriguing storylines across the world of sports, including debates on the latest issues, analysis of player performances, and discussions on game results and other news.

programme.desc: Exploring the growth of flag football around the United States and the world.

programme.desc: No. 8 Michigan State (24-5, 15-3) won five-straight games after a 71-62 win over Wisconsin behind 19 points from Jaden Akins; Iowa (15-14, 6-12) is 12-5 at home this season, and won five of its last six meetings with the Spartans.

programme.desc: No. 20 Marquette (22-7, 13-5) won four of its last five behind Kam Jones; UConn (20-9, 12-6) is 12-2 at home, and won its last four meetings with the Golden Eagles after a 77-69 win on Feb. 1 behind 25 points and 11 rebounds from Solo Ball.

programme.title: Women's College Basketball
programme.desc: UNLV claimed a 72-71 victory over Wyoming in their first meeting of the season on Jan. 19 behind 22 points and 3 assists from Amarachi Kimpson; Allyson Fertig posted 22 points and 9 rebounds for the Cowgirls in the loss on the road.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: DePaul (11-18, 2-16) dropped its last six games; Providence (12-17, 6-12) is 10-5 at home, and won its last seven meetings with the Blue Demons after a 70-63 OT win on Dec. 10 behind 20 points and seven assists from Bensley Joseph.

programme.title: Women's College Basketball
programme.desc: UNLV claimed a 72-71 victory over Wyoming in their first meeting of the season on Jan. 19 behind 22 points and 3 assists from Amarachi Kimpson; Allyson Fertig posted 22 points and 9 rebounds for the Cowgirls in the loss on the road.

programme.title: CONCACAF Champions League Soccer
programme.desc: Cruz Azul won the inaugural encounter against Seattle with an 11-0 victory in the 1996 CONCACAF Champions Cup, as Carlos Hermosillo and Julio César Yegros each notched a hat trick; Seattle Sounders advanced past Antigua GFC on aggregate, 6-2.

programme.title: Saudi Pro League Soccer
programme.desc: Al-Ittihad (18-3-2) has won the four previous meetings with the Knight of the East, including a 3-1 triumph at home in Week 7, as Moussa Diaby scored the decisive goal in the 67th minute; Al-Qadsiah (16-2-5) has won four in a row at home.

programme.title: CONCACAF Champions League Soccer
programme.desc: Columbus Crew SC qualified for the tournament after defeating LAFC in the 2024 Leagues Cup final, 3-1, on Aug. 25; Los Angeles FC advanced past Colorado Rapids on tournament away goals after its 1-0 victory in the second leg on Feb. 25.

programme.title: The Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show
programme.desc: The FOX Sports team shares coverage of the 2021 Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show as the canine competitors and their owners hope to be crowned the top spot in their respective classes before the coveted Best in Show award is given.

programme.title: Copa America 2024: Argentina's Road to Glory
CONCACAF Champions League Soccer
programme.desc: LA Galaxy is unbeaten in each of the two all-time encounters vs. El Team after securing a 4-1 victory in the second leg of their quarterfinal matchup in the 2012-13 edition of the tournament; Herediano advanced past Real Salt Lake on aggregate, 2-1.

programme.desc: With rapidly warming temperatures on the horizon, bass flock to the shallows to span and anglers will try to take advantage during this week's event, but a wide range of outcomes are possible and competitors have to be ready for all of them.

programme.title: Australian Football League
programme.desc: Hawthorn finished with 14 wins and nine losses in 2024; Sydney has won five of the past six meetings with the Hawks, including a 118-42 triumph at Melbourne Cricket Ground last season in Round 7, as Isaac Heeney kicked three goals from 21 disposals.

programme.desc: The top anglers across the country compete in a series of annual events that makes up bass fishing's most competitive league, featuring millions of dollars in prizes, tournaments taking place throughout the U.S., and coverage of all the major phases.
